Plot radial gauges (highcharts)

Source: R/plot_gauge.R
plot_gauge.Rd

Plot radial gauges (highcharts)

Usage

plot_gauge(iso3 = names(ISO3), unit = "km3", ...)

Arguments

...

Arguments passed on to hc_themed

hc

a highchart object

title

chart title

subtitle

chart subtitle

label

optional annotation

base_font

default font for all chart elements

axes

show axes (default: TRUE)

exporting

include chart export menu (default: TRUE)

credits

include credits (default: FALSE)

Examples

plot_gauge(iso3="ken")
